Class VappSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iland.core.api.vcd.VappSpec

    public class VappSpec
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Vapp Spec. Specification for creating a new vApp and associated networks from a vApp template.
    Author:
    Brett Snyder
    See Also:
